New Records: Sikandar Raza broke the record for the best bowling figures in a T20 World Cup match by a Zimbabwean bowler with 3 wickets for 14 runs
Key Match Events: Pakistan managed 129/8 in response to Zimbabwe's 130/8
Babar Azam was packed cheaply on 4
Mohammad Rizwan was cleaned up on 14 by Blessing Muzarabani
Shan Masood was stumped on 44 by Sikandar Raza
Shadab Khan and Shan Masood kept the scoreboard ticking
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's defeat against India makes the clash against Zimbabwe a crucial encounter as far as the semifinal race is concerned
The margin for error for Babar Azam and Co. is very little
Haris Rauf will surely hold the key for Pakistan in the clash against Zimbabwe
Shaheen Afridi's fitness has been a concern for the Pakistan management
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan endured a one-run defeat against Zimbabwe in the Super 12 encounter
The results come as a strong blow to Pakistan, who are yet to open their account at the showpiece event
Pakistan batter Iftikhar Ahmed said that the team is 'feeling the pain and hurt' but the morale is still 'high'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The weather is expected to be slightly chilly, with temperatures dropping to 15 degree Celsius
The good news is that rains are likely to remain away
